content: Whoâ€™s Ruiyang Ruiyang, a young Private Equity investor focused on China Tech Ruiyang was born and raised in Yunnan, after his undergraduate at CUHK, he started working at FutureX Capital and focus on technology companies investment. He has participated in deals including Bytedance, NIO, and Kingsoft Cloud. In his free time, he loves fine dining and traveling. Ruiyang also has a passion for writing and fitness.
title: About Ruiyang
